text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
Good work in your Mock Race, Rhein Kraft! 5 lengths 
was magnificent. Please give us more of your thoughts!

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
First――in the racing world, there are quite 
a few stars. Are there any Uma Musume that 
made you think 『I want to be like them!』?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Of course, the Uma Musume that are 
active in the Triple Tiara rotation!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Like Mejiro Ramonu-san and Air Groove-san…… 
they're awe-inspiring, dignified, and sparkly…… 
I really admire those strong senpai!

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
"Strength"……! If that's what you admire, then 
surely there are some other Uma Musume in the 
Triple Crown rotation that you admire as well?

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
Like the two that took the world by storm, Rudolf-san 
and Brian-san? When you think of the word "Strength" 
wouldn't these two Uma Musume come to mind too!?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Ah, well yeah. That's true, I do also respect 
my senpais in the Triple Crown, but――

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: But still, I admire the Triple Tiara Uma Musume more.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
I-I see……? 
Sorry, but could you tell me a little bit more about why……?

The reporter sounded kind of confused. 
……But, I suppose it was to be expected.

Air Groove had successfully won the Autumn 
Tenno Sho recently, and Hishi Amazon had been 
able to keep up with Narita Brian. However――

『When it came to the Senior Class, whenever the 
Triple Tiara and Triple Crown Uma Musume competed 
together, the former was usually defeated』――

That was how things normally went. The race results 
throughout history had consistently shown that.

For example, in the Grand Prix races, the Takarazuka 
Kinen and Arima Kinen, where many strong Uma Musume 
gathered, a Tiara Uma Musume hadn't won in over 30 years……

When one thought of pure "strength", 
the Triple Crown Uma Musume would come to mind――

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
No, after all, they're strong too. 
The Triple Tiara Uma Musume definitely are.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
I understand what you are saying. I get it. 
……but that's exactly why I want to prove it!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Because they're so awe-inspiring, lively, and dignified, I admire 
them! That's why I admire those that choose the Triple Tiara!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
I'll take the Triple Tiara. And then, during the 
Senior class, I'll challenge the Triple Crown girls.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
――And I'll win! I'll prove the 
strength of the Triple Tiara Uma Musume!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Because they really are strong. 
Those girls……we all are!

Once again I had that feeling in my chest. I remember. 
It wasn't just childish admiration――it really was shocking.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
T-that's……I see. 
Well, I don't know what to say――

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Ahahaa, rather than not understanding……it's more like you don't 
believe me? I guess I am saying some unbelieveable things though.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Ah, in that case! Will you come and do another interview? 
I'll be entering the upcoming Selection race.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
I'll definitely show you there――with a run that 
will make you think 『She might be able to do it』.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
And then someday, just like how I admired my Tiara senpais…… 
even if now it might be small, that hope, and those expectations――

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
With my run, someday for sure! 
I'll show them all!

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text:
Ahahahaha! How amusing…… 
that girl is quite interesting, isn't she? Rhein Kraft……huh?

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text:
As an Uma Musume also aiming for the Triple Tiara―― 
it might be best for me to check up on her, right?

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text:
……And, judging by that sharp look in your eye, 
I assume you feel the same? Air Messiah, was it?

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
Yes, Daring Heart-san. Though to be more precise, 
I've been keeping my eye on both of you since I 
found out we were running in the same Selection Race.

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
I've already begun collecting information 
and preparing countermeasures for you. 
Daring Heart-san, and Rhein Kraft-san――

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text: And one more.

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text:
Cesario-san! With your amazing last leg, you were able to win 
convincingly! If you have a moment, could we have a word?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
……No. 
I apologize, but I will excuse myself here.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
With the Selection race approaching, my training schedule 
has been quite demanding. ……Well then, please excuse me.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Haa, haa, haa, haa……! 
Yaaaaaaaーーーーー!!!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Haaa, haaa, haaa, haaa…… 
Haaaaaa~~……!

Ever since then, Rhein Kraft has been training 
hard. From early in the morning all the way 
until just before curfew, as much as she could……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Oh, Trainer-san! So you were watching me. Ah, now that 
I think about it, I think I saw you at the mock race……?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Wah, you were!? Ehehe~ thank you very much. 
……then, I guess I'll take a short break.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
I'll show you something Trainer-san. 
The way I keep myself fully motivated!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Tadaa! My personal collection of 『Tiara race videos』! 
While taking a break, let's watch together.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, to increase my motivation this is the best. When I'm 
tired……or when I need to refocus, I'll always watch these.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
These past races are so full of emotion, and I feel 
connected to all of it. ……then, I'm starting it, okay――!
